comment: Great guy and very motivated. Classes were sort of meaningless, but his activities outside of class were good. Sometimes he lets students run over him, but overall great guy.

He is the best teacher I have ever had. He is young, so he understands what is happening in your life. For HPS 1810, Outdoor Recreation, Wes is the ONLY teacher you should take. The class(including Wes) and I became so close. He gives one test at the end of the semester.
You have to take KSU 1101. He is a great professor, and you get to do the rope course. He doesn't use the book that much.

This class is a waist of time (everything is common sense), but if you have to take it then take him!! He makes it fun. We did yo-go one day. He is laided back, he can take a joke, he is funny, extremely cute, and his class is an easy A. There is work to do, but it is not difficult.
I really enjoyed Professor Riddle's class. Our peer leader was great too. They both make a great team. Not a hard class just do the work. Fun and easy.

This class has a ropes course and it's really fun! It has a lot of projects, but they're group ones so it's not too hard.  Just turn your homework in and students will do good.  He's really helpful if you ask him for anything! He's the best looking professor i've ever had!

Wes Riddle is a great professor. He is young but very smart and is very interesting. The class is pointless as we all know but he gives good assignments that are easy and fun. I really enjoyed his class. He is probably my favorite professor to date. TAKE HIM, YOU WILL ENJOY THE CLASS. :)

Can I just say how cute this man is?? He is very easy going, young, nice, and fun. The class is stupid and pointless but many are required to take it and he makes it enjoyable... You do not have to show up everyday, do the easy work and you will get an A.
WES IS A GREAT PROFESSOR! VERY INTERESTING, FUN AND MAKES THE MATERIAL INTERESTING. EASY "A" IF YOU DO ALL THE WORK. TAKE HIS COURSE!
WES IS A GREAT PROFESSOR! VERY INTERESTING, FUN AND MAKES THE MATERIAL INTERESTING. EASY "A" IF YOU DO ALL THE WORK. TAKE HIS COURSE!
All I can say is he is AWESOME. Take him. He is a very enjoyable person to be around. HE is easy going. Also will bring you breakfast sometimes. He makes the boring material interesting.
I'm still trying to figure out why we even had to take the class.  It was an easy A though.  I think you could probably just not show up and still make an A.
He is so great!!You will love this class, easy A, and is fun to look at!

Wes is AWESOME! The freshman seminar class wouldn't have been the same without him. He's easy, helpful, and fun. It's an easy A if you do everything. There's a lot of homework but it's manageable! He also gives you time to make up work. The quizzes are all online and you have multiple times to take them till you get a 100. :)
